definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
"dot" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 3)/see also 點|点[dian3]
sun/CL:個|个[ge4]/abbr. for 太陽穴|太阳穴[tai4 yang2 xue2]
Taiyuan prefecture level city and capital of Shanxi province 山西省 in central north China
Taiyuan prefecture level city and capital of Shanxi province 山西省 in central north China

sentences.english: She was too slight to play basketball.
sentences.chinese: 她太纤弱了，无法打篮球。

sentences.english: Make sure none of the audio components are positioned too close to the TV set.
sentences.chinese: 确认各声频设备是否太靠近电视机。

sentences.english: A Christmas tree was placed in the comer of the brilliant hall. How beautiful it was!
sentences.chinese: 圣诞树放在灯火通明的客厅的一角，实在是太荚了。

sentences.english: They become too attached to the computer screen. It isn't healthy.
sentences.chinese: 他们变得太黏在计算机屏幕前，这很不健康。

sentences.english: The book treats the problem too sketchily.
sentences.chinese: 该书关于这一问题写得太简略。

sentences.english: You are already too locked in to a vendor-specific standard.
sentences.chinese: 已经受到特定供应商的标准的太多约束。

sentences.english: Don't wear too much perfume or aftershave.
sentences.chinese: 不要使用太多香水或须后水。

sentences.english: Make sure that the room you're studying in is not too cold or too warm.
sentences.chinese: 确保学习的房间不要太冷或太温暖。

sentences.english: Never waste too much time on some new words and single sentences.
sentences.chinese: 不要在单个词或单句上浪费太多时间。

sentences.english: I doubt an opportunity like this, for unschooling, will come again soon.
sentences.chinese: 对不上学来说，这样的机会不会太多。

sentences.english: Want to manure the whole place over, scabby soil.
sentences.chinese: 这片土壤太贫瘠了，想整个儿施一通肥。

sentences.english: Even the consequences of glacier retreat are poorly understood.
sentences.chinese: 人们甚至对冰川退缩的后果也不太清楚。

sentences.english: To tell you the truth, I did not like her. I thought she was too much enchanting.
sentences.chinese: 说实话，起初我并不喜欢她，感觉她太妖娆了。

sentences.english: Some laminates are available in plain colors, too.
sentences.chinese: 一些层板可在普通的颜色，太。

sentences.english: Your bra band is too large.
sentences.chinese: 也许你的胸罩带子太宽了。
太危言耸听了，“她告诉我。

definition: so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this
straight/erect/to stick out (a part of the body)/to (physically) straighten up/to support/to withstand/outstanding/(coll.) quite/very/classifier for machine guns
enough (sufficient)/enough (too much)/(coll.) (before adj.) really/(coll.) to reach by stretching out
very/completely/utterly/extremely/absolutely/hundred percent/to divide into ten equal parts
